His Gifts

Jul 5, 2012

Faith

Thank You for beauty

of sight,

of sound…

Images and noises that make me want to spin around

in joy,

to close my eyes

and sway,

lost in delight

of creation and its Creator.

You must love us so

to give us such gifts.

Do You smile

as we do

when we open them

and laugh in our delight?

Oh, Abba,

thank You!

Thank You

for Life!

Sometimes we don’t get to choose. Sometimes God grabs our hands and leads us on a journey. One we may not understand. One we would not have chosen. But one that shapes, changes, and saves our lives. Because He is merciful. Because He loves us.
